name: Verus Miner Static Builder
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y autoconf automake libtool pkg-config libcurl4-openssl-dev libjansson-dev libgomp1 && chmod +x ./autogen.sh ./build.sh || true && ./autogen.sh && ./configure --disable-cuda --disable-opencl CFLAGS='-O3 -march=native' LDFLAGS='-static' --enable-static --with-pic && make -j$(nproc)
